mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into userInfo (user_name, user_psw, sex, phone, level, integral, email, nickname, start_time, end_login_time, end_time, head_portrait, comments ) values (#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update userInfo set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_psw = #{userPsw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{userLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_login_time = #{endLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, head_portrait = #{headPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_psw, sex, phone, level, integral, email, nickname, start_time, end_login_time, end_time, head_portrait,comments from userInfo where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
